data.text: Walelwa wa heye wowa wawele na mong'ho kuli isi,
Kuli ng'handa ya heye kowa na lufufu lwinji,
Munhu yanojile kangulangaziwaga lumuli kuli jiza,
Ganojile gomuyila munhu yula yawele na isungu na yalingwazika ne kugana mzidi,
Kangulavyaga kwa isungu na kuwapa wazunwa,
Wanhu wehile wangugona ago na kuzudila,
